resources.string: The maximum number of files cannot be less than the minimum number of files
choose at least one file name element
Too few file name elements may produce duplicate results
We need permissions to create folders in your storage space
ready to start creating a folder
The folder is created, a total of %1$d files are created, located at: %2$s
The compressed folder is completed, located at: %1$s
"/storage/emulated/0" in the folder path indicates the root directory of the device storage space. If your device supports SD card, it means the built-in storage space of the device
Password is a code with hidden logic. \nFor those who don\'t know the logic, this is a bunch of garbled characters.
In each paragraph of text, if we only look at the content in certain positions, then they may be spliced into meaningful content. \nSuppose, each paragraph of text is a file name?
If there are four files in a folder, then there are four choices. \nIf there are four more folders in each folder, then there are 16 choices. \nWhat if there are 4 folders inside?
